name: Patrick Snow
what_you_do: Patrick Snow helps aspiring authors write and publish their books, turning them into lead-generating tools for their businesses.
who_you_serve: He serves aspiring authors, professional speakers, coaches, and business consultants looking to publish their first-class books and achieve success.
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
current_projects: Free gift: 21 Mistakes to Avoid When Publishing and Marketing Your Book, 60-minute publishing and book marketing webinar.
bio: Over 1,300 clients served, sold over one million copies of books in five languages and 108 countries, featured in USA TODAY, The New York Times, and Forbes.
business_focus: Patrick Snow helps aspiring authors write and publish their books, turning them into lead-generating tools for their businesses. (book publishing)

jv_history.partner_name: How Starter Story ditched recurring payments and built a $1.5 million information product
jv_history.source_quote: and co-author of the New York Times bestselling book Billion Dollar Whale. In 2021, he co-founded Project Brazen, a production studio that creates narrative nonfiction across
